openOnDblClick.description: If true, double-clicking a folder node's label will open it, rather than calling onDblClick()

persist.description: Enables/disables use of cookies for state saving.

dndController.description:
Class name to use as as the dnd controller.  Specifying this class enables DnD.
Generally you should specify this as "dijit.tree.dndSource".

dragThreshold.description: Number of pixels mouse moves before it's considered the start of a drag operation

betweenThreshold.description:
Set to a positive value to allow drag and drop "between" nodes.

If during DnD mouse is over a (target) node but less than betweenThreshold
pixels from the bottom edge, dropping the the dragged node will make it
the next sibling of the target node, rather than the child.

Similarly, if mouse is over a target node but less that betweenThreshold
pixels from the top edge, dropping the dragged node will make it
the target node's previous sibling rather than the target node's child.
